alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 2:38PM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches with localized areas in excess of 2 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From early Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
